      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TransactionSignature TransactionSignature.decodeFromBitcoin(byte[] bytes, boolean requireCanonical)
      Returns a decoded signature.
      static TransactionSignature TransactionSignature.dummy()
      Returns a dummy invalid signature whose R/S values are set such that they will take up the same number of encoded bytes as a real signature.
